greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n is prime(k)^e, e >= 1, then a(n) = k, otherwise 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: If A001221(n) = 1 [when n is in A000961], then a(n) = A055396(n) = A001511(A297108(n)), otherwise 0.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 25 2017
